title: It Will Be Over In A Single Move (Part 2)
body:
It Will Be Over In A Single Move (Part 2)

"Let's go, we need to finish everything quickly," Evan said and quickly walked towards the closed stone door when he heard the sound of fighting.

"How are we going to leave from here? This entire room is made of Reinforced Dolomite Stones. Even with all our might, we will not be able to put even a scratch o_"

Bang!

Before Malark could finish speaking, Evan punched the stone door.

Rumble!

A loud booming sound echoed out and the entire room shook. Malark lost his balance and dropped to the ground, but he didn't care about it and looked at the stone door with his eyes wide open.

Slowly, cracks started to spread all over the door like spiderwebs and small chunks of stones started to fall down from it.

Malark opened his mouth to say something, but before he could say anything...

....Bang!

Another booming sound echoed out and the entire Dolomite Stone door turned into dust.
